CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Shows 4 view windows, providing an engineering drawing style layout.
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_view

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera position on X and Y axes. Controllable by right or middle clicking the preview window.
CONTROLS.NAME: cam_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera position on Z axis. Controllable by right or middle clicking the preview window.
CONTROLS.NAME: cam_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Set camera to right side view
CONTROLS.NAME: view_right

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Set camera to left side view
CONTROLS.NAME: view_left

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Which shader code to use for the hit objects in the raymarcher.
CONTROLS.NAME: shader_mode

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Which shape to render in the scene.
CONTROLS.NAME: shape

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Modify the shape. Has a different effect on each shape.
CONTROLS.NAME: shape_mod

DESCRIPTION: Example scene for 3D raymarching and mouse camera controls. Includes a grid view and a few different shaders and shapes.
TITLE: 3D Orbit Camera_dup
